titleStmt.title: A discourse of money Being an essay on that subject, historically and politically handled. With reflections on the present evil state of the coin of this kingdom; and proposals of a method for the remedy. In a letter to a nobleman, &c.

A discourse of money Being an essay on that subject, historically and politically handled. With reflections on the present evil state of the coin of this kingdom; and proposals of a method for the remedy. In a letter to a nobleman, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Briscoe, at the corner of Charles-Street, in Russel-Street, Covent-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing B4744 (number cancelled in 2nd ed.) on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproduction of originals in: British Library and Folger Shakespeare Library.
